price: Je! Nyinyi mnao wana wanaume na Yeye ndio awe na wanawake?
footnotes: Mkagawa, nyinyi muwe na watoto wa kiume, na mkamfanyia Mwenyezi Mungu awe na watoto wa kike!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
